statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 20 \\ 6 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ -36 \\ -8 \\ 11 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 20 \\ 6 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ -36 \\ -8 \\ 11 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
